required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison Between the Onlay and Inlay Techniques for Patellar Resurfacing in Posterior Cruciate Ligament-Substituting Total Knee Arthroplasty
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison Between the Onlay and Inlay Techniques for Patellar Resurfacing in Posterior Cruciate Ligament-Substituting Total Knee Arthroplasty: A Prospective, Randomized Controlled Trial

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to compare clinical outcome in posterior cruciate ligament-substituting total knee arthroplasty with onlay patellar resurfacing technique and inlay patellar resurfacing technique

primary_outcome.measure: Change of post-operative anterior knee pain
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline Visual Analog Scale for anterior knee pain at 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Visual Analog Scale for anterior knee pain (minimum 0, maximum 10) Do higher values represent a worse outcome

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline Knee Society and Knee Society function score at 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Knee Society and Knee Society function score (minimum 0, maximum 200)

primary_outcome.measure: Knee Society and Knee Society function score
primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline Knee Society and Knee Society function score at 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Knee Society and Knee Society function score (minimum 0, maximum 200)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline new patellar score at 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months after surgery
Change from baseline Oxford knee score 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months after surgery
Change from baseline Prevalence of anterior knee pain ,AKP 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Prevalence of anterior knee pain ,AKP (minimum 0, maximum 10)

primary_outcome.time_frame: Change from baseline patellar crepitus complication 3 months, 6 months, and 12 months after surgery
primary_outcome.description: Prevalence of patellar crepitus complication (present, absent)

intervention.intervention_name: Total knee with onlay patellar resurfacing technique
intervention.description: The patellar resurfacing technique that the patellar implant is embedded on the patellar bone.The patellar implant is placed on top of a flat tibial osteotomy or cut-surfaced bone

intervention.intervention_name: Total knee with inlay patellar resurfacing technique
intervention.description: The patellar resurfacing technique that the patellar implant is embedded in the patellar bone.The patellar implant is surrounded by a rim of cortical bone and supported by hardened, sclerotic bone

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Primary osteoarthritis of knee who were scheduled for a primary total knee arthroplasty
Exclusion Criteria:
- Valgus deformity
- History of inflammatory arthroplathy
- Previous fracture or open surgery on the same knee
- History of patellar instability

overall_official.affiliation: Department of Orthopaedics, Faculty of Medicine Vajira Hospital, Navamindradhiraj University
